message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NI. 

The paper deals with the problem of secure regeneration in a distributed storage system, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The concept of multilevel diversity coding involves coding theory and graph theory, which fall under the categories of distributed systems (cs.DS) and social and information networks (cs.SI). Finally, the paper also deals with network security and privacy (cs.NI) as it considers the scenario where an eavesdropper can access some of the repair data.
